## Accelerate your migration and modernization journey with Azure Essentials, Azure Migrate, and GitHub Copilot—empowering your organization to join the ranks of Frontier Firms: businesses that put AI and cloud innovation at the core of their strategy. Supported by expert guidance and investments through Azure Accelerate, every step is secure, resilient, and ready for the future of agentic applications.

**Introduction**

Accelerate your migration and modernization journey with Azure Essentials, Azure Migrate, and GitHub Copilot—empowering your organization to join the ranks of Frontier Firms: businesses that put AI and cloud innovation at the core of their strategy. Supported by expert guidance and investments through Azure Accelerate, every step is secure, resilient, and ready for the future of agentic applications.

*Join the [Migrate and Modernize Summit,](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/events/launch-events/migrate-and-modernize-summit)where Microsoft will show new AI-assisted migration tools that will help teams modernize.*

**Why Secure and Resilient Migration Matters More Than Ever**

Migrating to Azure is more than a technical upgrade—it’s a strategic move that positions your organization to lead as a Frontier Firm, where AI and cloud innovation drive transformation. By prioritizing secure and resilient migration practices, businesses unlock new opportunities for collaboration between human teams and AI agents, strengthen customer trust, and lay the groundwork for breakthrough, data-driven innovation.

Today, organizations are increasingly looking to migrate with AI—leveraging tools like [Azure Migrate](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/migrate/migrate-services-overview?view=migrate-classic) and [GitHub Copilot](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/products/github/copilot) to accelerate and simplify the process, while ensuring their cloud environment is secure, resilient, and ready for agentic applications.

A resilient migration strategy ensures continuity of critical operations and enables rapid recovery from disruptions. This approach not only benefits IT teams, but also protects revenue, business continuity, and customer relationships—while opening the door to the next wave of AI-powered opportunities.

**Secure Migration: The Foundation for AI Readiness**

With Azure, teams can accelerate discovery, code upgrades, and refactoring—an AI-assisted approach that compresses timelines and hardens security and governance enroute to [AI-ready landing zones](https://github.com/Azure/AI-Landing-Zones). By embedding security throughout the migration lifecycle, organizations lay the groundwork for trust, compliance, and data integrity—key prerequisites for deploying advanced AI workloads in the cloud.

This secure, well-governed environment protects sensitive data, ensures regulatory compliance, and supports the accuracy and effectiveness of AI models. Consequently, organizations can strategically experiment with, implement, and expand AI solutions, leverage predictive analytics, and foster breakthroughs that generate measurable business value.

**Azure Essentials: Your Blueprint for Secure and Resilient Migration**

Azure Essentials offers organizations a comprehensive blueprint for secure, resilient, and cost-effective migration to the cloud. Frontier Firms rely on these proven methodologies and tools to confidently modernize their infrastructure, drawing on best practices shaped by real-world customer experiences.

A successful cloud migration unfolds in three key phases:

1. Phase One: Establishing readiness and foundation
2. Phase 2: Designing and deploying with governance
3. Phase 3: Managing and optimizing deployments

By following the Azure Essentials framework, organizations can build a secure, well-governed foundation that supports agentic applications and positions them to scale AI innovation with confidence.

**Phase One: Readiness and Foundation—Laying the Groundwork for Security and Resiliency**

Security and resiliency start from the very first phase. Azure Essentials emphasizes a meticulous approach to readiness—beginning with a comprehensive view of your IT landscape and a tailored migration strategy.

- Use tools like [Azure Migrate](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/products/azure-migrate/?msockid=28f1ae6763066aeb063fbb2d624e6b7a) for precise inventory and dependency mapping.

- Consult migration guides to ensure all preparation activities are complete.

- Establish baseline security and resiliency controls, including robust identity management, encrypted communications, and network segmentation, by drawing from the [Azure Security Benchmark](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/security/benchmark/azure/introduction) and [Cloud Adoption Framework](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/ready/landing-zone/).

- Architect for high availability, disaster recovery, and redundancy, leveraging Azure’s built-in geo-redundant infrastructure and backup solutions.

- Create [platform landing zones](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/ready/landing-zone/) with governance guardrails.

- Apply financial best practices like [Azure Hybrid Benefit](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/offers/hybrid-benefit/?msockid=28f1ae6763066aeb063fbb2d624e6b7a) and [FinOps](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/cloud-computing/finops/overview) methodologies.

**Phase Two: Design and Govern—Executing Migration with Secure Governance and Resilient Architectures**

Effective migrations are executed with clarity, control, and confidence.

- Combine Azure Migrate with [GitHub Copilot](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/products/github/copilot) to accelerate assessment, code remediation, and refactoring.

- Azure Essentials provides detailed migration paths with built-in security checkpoints, compliance validation, and resiliency testing.

- Implement [Azure role-based access control (RBAC)](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/role-based-access-control/overview).

- Automate security with [Azure Security Center](https://azuremarketplace.microsoft.com/en/marketplace/apps/Microsoft.AzureSecurityCenter?tab=Overview).

- Maintain clear documentation.

- Design architectures that optimize reliability, cost, and security using proven customer best practices (failover strategies, load balancing, distributed systems across Azure regions).

- For AI workloads, configure centralized, scalable, and compliant landing zones to support performance and growth.

**Phase Three: Manage and Optimize—Sustaining Security, Resiliency, and Value in the Cloud**

Migration is just the beginning. Sustained success requires ongoing attention to security, resiliency, and optimization.

- Use [Azure Policy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/governance/policy/) and [Microsoft Defender for Cloud](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/defender-for-cloud/defender-for-cloud-introduction) to validate your cloud posture and close gaps proactively.

- Monitor performance and threats with [Azure Monitor](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/fundamentals/overview) and [Log Analytics in Azure Monitor](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/logs/log-analytics-overview?tabs=simple).

- Set up custom alerts for real-time oversight.

- Optimize resources and spending with [Microsoft Cost Management](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cost-management-billing/costs/overview-cost-management) and [Azure Advisor](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/advisor/advisor-overview).

- Stay ahead of emerging threats and compliance requirements by leveraging community resources and product updates.

- Use the [Azure Well-Architected Framework](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/well-architected/service-guides/?product=popular) to assess and improve your architecture for long-term value and resilience.

**Innovate, Protect, and Strengthen Resiliency with Azure Essentials**

Secure and resilient migration is a continuous journey. [Azure Essentials](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/solutions/azure-essentials/) supports every step—from readiness and foundation to execution and ongoing optimization—helping you do more than migrate workloads. It positions your organization for a future defined by agility, security, and transformation.

Organizations that thrive are those that build on a resilient, well-governed foundation and continuously optimize for what is next.

**Ready to accelerate your journey as a Frontier Firm?**

Our newest offering, [Azure Accelerate](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/solutions/azure-accelerate/?msockid=28f1ae6763066aeb063fbb2d624e6b7a), provides access to trusted experts, unlocks Microsoft investments, and provides comprehensive support across every scenario—from migrations and modernization to data platforms, AI applications, and intelligent agents.

A key benefit is the Cloud Accelerate Factory, where Microsoft experts work alongside your team or partners to provide zero-cost deployment support for over 30 Azure services, helping you avoid common pitfalls, speed up delivery, and free up internal resources for high-impact work.

Discover more here: [Azure Accelerate (formerly Azure Innovate and Azure Migrate and Modernize) | Microsoft Azure](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/solutions/azure-accelerate)
